title: ACSI - U.S. customer satisfaction with social media 2019
summary: The ACSI U.S. Platform in the satisfaction with was Platform Wikipedia , who made 80 score .
The most U.S. Platform was Snapchat , with just 63 score .

In second place was Platform YouTube with 78 score ; third place went to Platform Pinterest with 80 score ; fourth place went to Platform Facebook with 63 score and fifth place went to Platform Instagram , who was 72 score .
gold: This graph shows the American Customer Satisfaction Index ( ACSI ) of customer satisfaction with social media websites in 2019 . Overall , Pinterest scored the highest level of customer satisfaction with 80 index points . Facebook was ranked last with an index score rating of 63 / 100 index points .
